pullrequest.title: Write to disk from a background thread in log recorder

content.raw: I guess it depends on the use case. Forcing a disk write can cause topics to go out of sync with simulation causing a whole host of issues. Ideally, this "forcing" would be done from the user end (eg. ign-gazebo) so simulation is blocked from stepping while writing to disk. I'm not sure how we can accomplish that with the current design though.
